name: 2Dshooter-Space Escape
description:
This is my Unity Project - 2DShooter

Modifications:-

  1.  Added Sprites  &  animation in MainMenu Scene.
  2. Added unique levels  &  story in the game.
  3. Final level music changed to give the feel of a boss battle.
  4. Add Survival mode which can be selected from level select.
